content:
I do not want to view the message pane and I disabled it. But it always comes back.

Earlier, somebody posted : Try this: Help/Troubleshooting, Profile Folder, Open Folder, close TB, delete session.json, the file that stores the TB layout when it's closed. Restart TB and see if the Message Pane status is retained.

Can you please be more clear?
creator: jjvjjv

content:
Welcome, ad.hensen,

Tell us which version of Thunderbird you are running, and we'll give you directions for getting Subject back in the columns list. It's easier in 102.x than in 115.x, but it's not rocket science in either of them.
creator: danawilson001

content: See the All Mail section here: http://kb.mozillazine.org/Gmail
